author: Byron Pulsifer
message: Strength to carry on despite the odds means you have faith in your own abilities and know how.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: Make the most of yourself for that is all there is of you.
title: Thought of the day

author: Lama Yeshe
message: Be gentle first with yourself if you wish to be gentle with others.
title: Thought of the day

author: Cardinal Retz
message: A man who doesn't trust himself can never really trust anyone else.
title: Thought of the day
